name: Bar Dip
description: Targets chest, triceps, and shoulders to build upper body strength.

name: Bench Press
description: Strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps with a pressing motion.

name: Cable Chest Press
description: Engages the chest muscles with a controlled pressing motion using cables.

name: Decline Bench Press
description: Emphasizes the lower chest, targeting the pectoral muscles from a decline angle.

name: Dumbbell Chest Fly
description: Stretches and strengthens the chest muscles with an isolated fly motion.

name: Dumbbell Chest Press
description: Targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps using a pressing motion with dumbbells.

name: Dumbbell Decline Chest Press
description: Focuses on the lower chest, working the pectoral muscles with a decline angle press.

name: Dumbbell Floor Press
description: Targets the chest and triceps, providing stability with reduced shoulder strain.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: Works the chest and lats, offering a stretch and contraction through the range of motion.

name: Feet-Up Bench Press
description: Engages the chest and core, focusing on chest development with feet elevated.

name: Barbell Floor Press
description: Strengthens the chest and triceps with limited shoulder involvement.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: Targets the upper chest and shoulders with an incline pressing motion.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Focuses on the upper chest, using a pressing motion with dumbbells at an incline.

name: Incline Push-Up
description: Strengthens the chest and triceps with a bodyweight incline variation.

name: Kneeling Incline Push-Up
description: A beginner-friendly version targeting the chest with reduced resistance.

name: Kneeling Push-Up
description: A modified push-up that focuses on chest, shoulders, and triceps for beginners.

name: Machine Chest Fly
description: Isolates and stretches the chest muscles for focused development.

name: Machine Chest Press
description: Targets the chest with controlled pressing motion using machine assistance.

name: Pec Deck
description: Engages the chest muscles with a machine-assisted fly motion.

name: Push-Up
description: Strengthens the chest, triceps, and shoulders with a bodyweight pressing movement.

name: Push-Up Against Wall
description: Targets the chest with a focus on form for beginners or warm-ups.

name: Push-Ups With Feet in Rings
description: Engages chest and stabilizers with added instability from the rings.

name: Seated Resistance Band Chest Fly
description: Focuses on chest contraction and control using resistance bands.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
description: Targets the chest with added stability from the Smith machine.

name: Smith Machine Incline Bench Press
description: Emphasizes upper chest while supported by the Smith machine.

name: Standing Cable Chest Fly
description: Targets the chest with focused isolation using cable resistance.

name: Standing Resistance Band Chest Fly
description: Uses resistance bands for chest activation and mobility.

name: Bar Dip (Weighted)
description: Builds chest strength with added weight for progression.

name: Around The World
description: Engages the full chest through a wide range of motion.

name: Bar Dip (Assisted)
description: Assisted version of the bar dip for chest development with support.

name: Seated Chest Flys (Cable)
description: Targets chest muscles with controlled seated cable movements.

name: Low Cable Chest Fly
description: Focuses on the lower chest using low cable tension.

name: Iso-Lateral Chest Press
description: Emphasizes unilateral chest work with isolated motion.

name: Smith Machine Decline Bench Press
description: Targets the lower chest with decline movement on the Smith machine.

name: Decline Push-Up
description: Challenges the chest with increased intensity from decline angle.

name: Hex Press
description: Engages the chest with a close-grip dumbbell press variation.

name: High Cable Chest Fly
description: Targets upper chest muscles with high cable tension.

name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
description: Targets the upper chest with a fly movement on an incline bench.

name: Decline Dumbbell Fly
description: Emphasizes the lower chest muscles with a decline fly movement.

name: Clap Push-Up
description: A plyometric exercise that builds explosive power in the chest.

name: Diamond Push-Up
description: Targets the chest and triceps with hands placed close together.

name: Svend Press
description: Isolates the chest muscles by pressing a weight plate held between the palms.

name: Guillotine Press
description: Targets the upper chest with a barbell bench press lowering the bar to the neck.

name: Landmine Press
description: Works the chest and shoulders using a landmine setup for pressing.

name: Ring Push-Up
description: Engages chest and stabilizer muscles with push-ups on rings.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: Emphasizes the triceps and chest with a narrower grip on the bench press.

name: Single-Arm Push-Up
description: An advanced bodyweight exercise targeting chest strength and balance.

name: Wide-Grip Bench Press
description: Targets the chest muscles with a wider grip bench press.

name: Medicine Ball Push-Up
description: Challenges chest and core stability using a medicine ball.

name: Archer Push-Up
description: Targets the chest with uneven arm positions to increase difficulty.

name: Plate Press
description: Isolates the chest by pressing a weight plate between hands.
